Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Health and the Committee on Technology

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Health and the Committee on Technology
Oversight - COVID-19 and Seniors: Addressing Equity, Access to the Vaccine, and Scheduling Vaccination Appointments Online in NYC.
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - COVID-19 and Seniors: Addressing Equity, Access to the Vaccine, and Scheduling Vaccination Appointments Online in NYC.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the establishment of a plan for COVID-19 vaccination of homebound seniors, reporting on such plan, and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Establishment of a plan for COVID-19 vaccination of homebound seniors, reporting on such plan, and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof.

Items.Title: A Local Law in relation to the creation of a unified scheduling system for COVID-19 vaccinations, and to provide for the repeal thereof
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Creation of a unified scheduling system for COVID-19 vaccinations, and to provide for the repeal thereof.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation to protect New York State’s safety net providers and Special Needs Plans by eliminating the Medicaid pharmacy carve-out.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Protect NYS’s safety net providers and Special Needs Plans by eliminating the Medicaid pharmacy carve-out.

Items.Title: Resolution calling on the New York State Legislature to pass, and the Governor to sign, legislation allowing local health departments to implement changes to improve the COVID-19 vaccine roll out.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Allowing local health departments to implement changes to improve the COVID-19 vaccine roll out.
